content.raw:
Update: We discovered an additional problem while loading the world file in the server. The models were not fully downloaded because the timeout expired and the world was not fully loaded. I increased the timeout and show a message. 5380a0b

Thanks to @ichen and @scpeters for helping with the test hunting.

[New jenkins job](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/CI%20any%20jobs/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-trusty-amd64-gpu-nvidia/212/testReport/) in the queue.
content.html:
Update: We discovered an additional problem while loading the world file in the server. The models were not fully downloaded because the timeout expired and the world was not fully loaded. I increased the timeout and show a message. 5380a0b

Thanks to @ichen and @scpeters for helping with the test hunting.

New jenkins job in the queue.
